messages.content: Can you create a PR for the task sharing feature? Branch is feat/TF-247-task-sharing. Sarah Kim will review it since it's backend code. Make sure the PR title follows our format with the ticket number in brackets.
First let me rebase on main to make sure we're up to date before creating the PR.
Yes good thinking. Always rebase on main before creating a PR. Then create it with the title [TF-247] Add task sharing feature.
Rebased on main successfully. Created PR with title "[TF-247] Add task sharing feature". Added the three required sections in the description: Changes, Testing, and Screenshots.
Perfect. I'll ping Sarah for the review. Once she approves and CI passes, we can merge. Remember we need at least one approval before merging.
Noted. CI is currently running lint, type-check, and tests. I'll monitor the status.
Once it's approved and CI passes, do a squash merge. I hate merge commits. Then delete the branch after.
Will do. I'll squash merge once approved and CI is green, then delete the feat/TF-247-task-sharing branch.
